title: IConnectionPointFeatureData.IAccessSelections
description: Allows access to the selections that describe this connection point feature.
signature:
System.Boolean IAccessSelections( 
   ModelDoc2
TopDoc
,
   Component2
Component
)

parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: Component in which the feature is to be modified

returns: True if the selections were successfully accessed, false if not
remarks:
To modify a feature in a...
Then...
Part
TopDoc argument is the
IModelDoc2
for the part
Component argument is NULL
Assembly
TopDoc is the
IModelDoc2
object for the assembly
Component argument is the
IComponent2
object in which the feature is to be modified
This method puts the model into a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define this feature. You must use either of the following methods to restore the rollback state:
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
and
IFeature::IModifyDefinition2
if you modified the feature
IConnectionPointFeatureData::ReleaseSelectionAccess
if you did not
